publisher.publisher-name: Blackwell Publishers for the American Finance Association

title-group.article-title: Transition Densities for Interest Rate and Other Nonlinear Diffusions

abstract.p: This paper applies to interest rate models the theoretical method developed in Aït-Sahalia (1998) to generate accurate closed-form approximations to the transition function of an arbitrary diffusion. While the main focus of this paper is on the maximum-likelihood estimation of interest rate models with otherwise unknown transition functions, applications to the valuation of derivative securities are also briefly discussed.
